summary: REQ-1 (Group 3 color mapping) is implemented in the centralized color map. Evidence for REQ-2 (Publisher table Overseer/Assistant badge class alignment) is inconclusive from the provided truncated diff, and there are indications of additional Publishers page theming changes beyond the requested badge styling update.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the Publishers page table, update the Overseer and Assistant badges so their styling (background + text + hover behavior) matches the badge styling used for Overseer and Assistant on the Field Service Group profile page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx is truncated before any badge rendering/classes are shown, so the required Tailwind class alignment and hover behavior changes cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional Publishers page theming/table header changes (e.g., themed primary button, themed table header row) beyond the requested Overseer/Assistant badge styling update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-2 only asks to align Overseer/Assistant badge styling in the Publishers table. The diff shows new theming-related imports and (per file summary) themed header/button behavior, which is outside the specified badge-only scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/metadata files (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to repository metadata/status summary files; these are ancillary changes not required to satisfy REQ-1/REQ-2.
